languages.text: {n}Идира держится за нос, из которого сочится струйка крови.{/n} "Я видела смутные тени, протягивающие руки к шару сияющего огня и уволакивающие его прочь. И еще одну тень, куда больше и страшнее, которая шла за ними и распахнула огромный глаз, как только первые тени скрылись со своей добычей. Я не видела связей, сообщничества... скажу так — петелька зацепилась за крючок. Один малый страх заставил второй, огромный, выбраться из норы и действовать. Лучше объяснить не могу".

{n}Idira is holding her nose, trickling with blood.{/n} "I saw blurry shadows reaching for a ball of bright fire and pulling it away. And another shadow, much larger and more terrifying, that followed them. It opened its colossal eye when the others were gone with their loot. I saw no connections, no complicity... it was like a loop catching on a hook. A small terror made another, greater one, crawl out of its lair and act. That's the best I can explain it."
languages.original_text: {n}Идира держится за нос, из которого сочится струйка крови.{/n} "Я видела смутные тени, протягивающие руки к шару сияющего огня и уволакивающие его прочь. И еще одну тень, куда больше и страшнее, которая шла за ними и распахнула огромный глаз, как только первые тени скрылись со своей добычей. Я не видела связей, сообщничества... скажу так — петелька зацепилась за крючок. Один малый страх заставил второй, огромный, выбраться из норы и действовать. Лучше объяснить не могу".

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira is holding her nose, from which blood is trickling.{/n} "I saw blurry shadows reaching for a ball of bright fire and pulling it away. And another shadow, much larger and more terrifying, that followed them. It opened an enormous eye as soon as the original shadows were gone with their loot. I saw no connections, no complicity... it was, shall we say, a loop catching on a hook. A small terror made another and way greater terror crawl out of its hole and act. That's the best I can explain it."

{n}Idira is holding her nose, from which blood is trickling.{/n} "I saw blurry shadows reaching for a ball of bright fire and pulling it away. I saw no connections, no complicity... it was, shall we say, a loop catching on a hook. A small terror made another and way greater terror crawl out of its hole and act. That's the best I can explain it."

languages.text: {n}Idira hält sich die vor Blut triefende Nase.{/n} "Ich habe verschwommene Schatten gesehen, die nach einer Kugel aus leuchtendem Feuer greifen und sie fortziehen. Und einen anderen Schatten, sehr viel größer und furchterregender, der ihnen folgte. Er hat seine kolossalen Augen geöffnet, als die anderen mit ihrer Beute fort waren. Ich habe keine Verbindungen gesehen, keine Komplizenschaft ... das war wie eine Schlaufe, die an einem Haken hängenbleibt. Ein kleines Grauen, das zu einem anderen, größeren wird, aus seinem Loch gekrochen kommt und in Aktion tritt. Besser kann ich es nicht erklären."
languages.original_text: {n}Idira is holding her nose, trickling with blood.{/n} "I saw blurry shadows reaching for a ball of bright fire and pulling it away. And another shadow, much larger and more terrifying, that followed them. It opened its colossal eye when the others were gone with their loot. I saw no connections, no complicity... it was like a loop catching on a hook. A small terror made another, greater one, crawl out of its lair and act. That's the best I can explain it."

Und einen anderen Schatten, sehr viel größer und furchterregender, der ihnen folgte. Er hat seine kolossalen Augen geöffnet, als die anderen mit ihrer Beute fort waren. Ich habe keine Verbindungen gesehen, keine Komplizenschaft ... das war wie eine Schlaufe, die an einem Haken hängenbleibt. Ein kleines Grauen, das zu einem anderen, größeren wird, aus seinem Loch gekrochen kommt und in Aktion tritt. Besser kann ich es nicht erklären."

languages.text: {n}Idira pince son nez dégoulinant de sang.{/n} « J'ai vu des ombres floues tendre la main vers une boule de feu brillant et la saisir. Et une autre ombre, bien plus grande et terrifiante, qui les suivait. Elle a ouvert son œil gigantesque quand les autres sont parties avec leur butin. Je n'ai vu aucun lien, aucune complicité... c'était comme une boucle suspendue à un crochet. Une petite terreur en a fait sortir une autre, plus grande, de sa tanière pour passer à l'action. C'est la meilleure explication que je puisse donner. »
languages.original_text: {n}Idira is holding her nose, trickling with blood.{/n} "I saw blurry shadows reaching for a ball of bright fire and pulling it away. C'est la meilleure explication que je puisse donner. »

languages.text: {n}伊迪拉捏着流血的鼻子。{/n}“我看到模糊的影子伸向一个明亮的火球，把它拉走了，而另一个更大、更可怕的影子紧随其后。当其他影子带着战利品离开时，那个影子睁开了巨大的眼睛。这些影子之间没有任何联系，也没有共谋关系……就像一个钩子扣住了另一个钩子一样。一个小小的恐怖之物，引出了更加可怕的恐怖之物。它从巢穴中爬了出来，开始行动。我只能这么解释了。”
languages.original_text: {n}Idira is holding her nose, trickling with blood.{/n} "I saw blurry shadows reaching for a ball of bright fire and pulling it away. And another shadow, much larger and more terrifying, that followed them. It opened its colossal eye when the others were gone with their loot. I saw no connections, no complicity... it was like a loop catching on a hook. A small terror made another, greater one, crawl out of its lair and act. That's the best I can explain it."

traits.locale_text: {n}伊迪拉捏着流血的鼻子。{/n}“我看到模糊的影子伸向一个明亮的火球，把它拉走了，而另一个更大、更可怕的影子紧随其后。当其他影子带着战利品离开时，那个影子睁开了巨大的眼睛。这些影子之间没有任何联系，也没有共谋关系……就像一个钩子扣住了另一个钩子一样。一个小小的恐怖之物，引出了更加可怕的恐怖之物。它从巢穴中爬了出来，开始行动。我只能这么解释了。”

languages.text: {n}イディラは流血している鼻を押さえた。{/n}「ぼんやりとした影が明るい炎の玉に手を伸ばし、それを引き裂いて持って行くのを見たわ。そして、もう一つの影、はるかに大きくて恐ろしいものが、それに続いた。他の者たちが略奪品を持って去ったとき、その巨大な目を開いた。結びつきも、共謀も見当たらなかった…それはフックに引っかかるループのようだった。小さな恐怖が別の、より大きな恐怖を引き起こし、動かす。これが、あたいに説明できる精一杯よ」
languages.original_text: {n}Idira is holding her nose, trickling with blood.{/n} "I saw blurry shadows reaching for a ball of bright fire and pulling it away. And another shadow, much larger and more terrifying, that followed them. It opened its colossal eye when the others were gone with their loot. I saw no connections, no complicity... it was like a loop catching on a hook. A small terror made another, greater one, crawl out of its lair and act. That's the best I can explain it."

traits.locale_text: {n}イディラは流血している鼻を押さえた。{/n}「ぼんやりとした影が明るい炎の玉に手を伸ばし、それを引き裂いて持って行くのを見た。そして、もう一つの影、はるかに大きくて恐ろしいものが、それに続いた。他の者たちが略奪品を持って去ったとき、その巨大な目を開いた。結びつきも、共謀も見当たらなかった…それはフックに引っかかるループのようだった。小さな恐怖が別の、より大きな恐怖を引き起こし、動かす。それが、私が説明できる精一杯のこと」

languages.text: {n}Idira se tapa la nariz, chorreando sangre.{/n} «Vi sombras borrosas que alcanzaban una bola de fuego brillante y tiraban de ella. Y otra sombra, mucho más grande y aterradora, que les seguía. Abrió su ojo colosal cuando las otras se llevaron el botín. No vi ninguna conexión, ninguna complicidad... era como un lazo que se enganchaba en un garfio. Un pequeño horror hizo que otro, más grande, saliera de su guarida y actuara. No puedo explicarlo mejor».
languages.original_text: {n}Idira is holding her nose, trickling with blood.{/n} "I saw blurry shadows reaching for a ball of bright fire and pulling it away. And another shadow, much larger and more terrifying, that followed them. It opened its colossal eye when the others were gone with their loot. I saw no connections, no complicity... it was like a loop catching on a hook. A small terror made another, greater one, crawl out of its lair and act. That's the best I can explain it."

No puedo explicarlo mejor».

languages.text: {n}İdira kanayan burnunu tutuyor.{/n} "Bulanık gölgelerin parlak bir ateş topuna uzandığını, onu götürdüklerini gördüm. Peşlerinden de iri yarı, tüyler ürpertici bir başka gölge geliyordu. Diğerleri ganimeti götürdüğü anda devasa gözünü açıverdi. Hiçbir bağlantı, suça ortaklık göremedim... Kısır döngü gibiydi. Küçük bir dehşet, daha büyüğünü deliğinden çıkmaya ve harekete geçmeye zorladı. En iyi bu şekilde izah edebilirim."
languages.original_text: {n}Idira is holding her nose, trickling with blood.{/n} "I saw blurry shadows reaching for a ball of bright fire and pulling it away. And another shadow, much larger and more terrifying, that followed them. It opened its colossal eye when the others were gone with their loot. I saw no connections, no complicity... it was like a loop catching on a hook. A small terror made another, greater one, crawl out of its lair and act. That's the best I can explain it."

traits.locale_text: {n}İdira kanayan burnunu tutuyor.{/n} "Birkaç belirsiz figürün ateş topuna uzanıp götürdüğünü gördüm. Peşlerinden de iri yarı, tüyler ürpertici bir başka figür geliyordu. Diğerleri ganimeti götürdüğü anda devasa gözünü açıverdi. Yaptıklarına hiçbir anlam veremedim, hiçbir şeye bağdaştıramadım... Olacağı varmıştı da olmuş gibiydi. Hadise silsilesi gittikçe dehşetengiz bir felakete dönüştü. En iyi bu şekilde izah edebilirim."
